text: Hey, sorry for the very tardy response to this but just joined the channel. Obviously imagine this strategy may have pivoted given the current situation but I worked on various content pieces with several NHS department over the past couple of years. Some small to mid sized projects mainly around video/audio. No longer in my realm but happy to pass on any information I can if still relevent? Cheers A

attachments.fallback: [December 12th, 2019 10:45 AM] ben: Hey UK marketers, it's quite niche but I was wondering if any has (or knows anyone who has) targeted GP practice staff/NHS/other public institutions with content marketing? I'd love to talk to you because it's difficult to know where to start and I have a ton of questions.
